Episodes.Title: Enemies of Rome
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and his formidable army continue to outwit Rome's best commanders; the powers of the Empire desperately turn to wealthy politician Marcus Crassus for help in crushing the rebellion.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Wolves at the Gate
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus tries to provide food and shelter for his people; Crassus builds an army and receives an unexpected visitor.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Men of Honor
Episodes.Plot: A band of marauders may be Spartacus' only option for providing food and supplies for his warriors; Crassus' son Tiberius makes a fateful decision.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Decimation
Episodes.Plot: The existence of a possible spy causes tension between Spartacus and his men; Crassus uses a long-abandoned form of Roman punishment to teach his soldiers a brutal lesson.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Blood Brothers
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus' plan to weaken Crassus' forces and gain the upper hand is threatened by potential betrayal.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, sexual violence, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Spoils of War
Episodes.Plot: Gannicus is trapped behind enemy lines when Crassus leads an onslaught against the rebel-occupied city; Tiberius must hold a celebration in honor of a man he despises.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, sexual violence, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Mors Indecepta
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and Crixus clash over strategy when their forces become stranded on a snowbound ridge; Crassus loses control of those closest to him.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, sexual violence, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Separate Paths
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and the rebels reach a crossroads; Crassus and his men continue their relentless pursuit of Spartacus as the conflict between Caesar and Tiberius grows.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, sexual violence, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: The Dead and the Dying
Episodes.Plot: Crassus learns that a fellow prominent Roman is attempting to steal the glory of defeating Spartacus; Spartacus aims to secure a bargaining chip he can use against the Romans.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Victory
Episodes.Plot: Spartacus and his outnumbered rebels make one last attempt to win freedom in a final battle against the Romans led by Marcus Crassus.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, offensive language and sex scenes
